data.title: Broad Town Church of England Primary School
data.text:
We usually inspect good schools every 4 years or at any time if we have concerns.

We normally give one working day's notice before an inspection but can also inspect schools without notice.

Give feedback on this school

Use our Ofsted Parent View Survey to tell us what you think of this school or your child’s experiences.

For any general enquiries about Broad Town Church of England Primary School, please contact the school directly.

Get report alerts for Broad Town Church of England Primary School

You’ll only receive an email alert when we publish a new report.

Read our Contacting or Working with Ofsted: privacy notice to see what we do with your personal information.

You can also set up email alerts for other parts of the website. Find out more about email alerts for Ofsted.
